TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IFeatureFilter implements class Microsoft.FeatureManagement.IFeatureFilterMetadata

Docs.summary: A filter that can be used to determine whether some criteria is met to enable a feature. A feature filter is free to use any criteria available, such as process state or request content. Feature filters can be registered for a given feature and if any feature filter evaluates to true, that feature will be considered enabled.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1<bool> EvaluateAsync(class Microsoft.FeatureManagement.FeatureFilterEvaluationContext context) cil managed
Public Function EvaluateAsync (context As FeatureFilterEvaluationContext) As Task(Of Boolean)

Docs.param: A feature filter evaluation context that contains information that may be needed to evaluate the filter. This context includes configuration, if any, for this filter for the feature being evaluated.
Docs.summary: Evaluates the feature filter to see if the filter's criteria for being enabled has been satisfied.
Docs.returns: True if the filter's criteria has been met, false otherwise.
